option.name: originalContent
option.value:
FROM openjdk:21-jdk-slim
WORKDIR /app
COPY target/ai-dev-toolkit-1.0.0.jar app.jar
EXPOSE 8080
ENV SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=prod
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "app.jar"]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
FROM maven:3.9.6-eclipse-temurin-21 AS build
WORKDIR /app
COPY pom.xml . RUN mvn dependency:go-offline -B
COPY src ./src RUN mvn clean package -DskipTests
FROM eclipse-temurin:21-jre-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=build /app/target/ai-dev-toolkit-1.0.0.jar app.jar
EXPOSE ${PORT:-8080}
ENV SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=prod
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "app.jar"]
